about_the_game:
What would you do if you can stop the time?
Be the master of time?
Or do some crazy things that you've never done?

On the day you back home, you find an old timer that can stop the time, it's cool, right? With the timer, you can do a lot of things that you couldn't do before. Once the timer is on, the whole world stops. So a time stopping adventure begins! Is it a good thing? Or a curse? Let's find out!

FEATURES

3 dateable characters
5 fuckable characters
Over 100 full scene illustrations
30 hot animated scenes
Hours of playing time, and steamy stories that are decided by your choices
Windows, Mac, and Android Available

content_descriptors.notes:
This game depicts consensual homosexual relationships that involve sexual activity of different types, including kissing, oral, anal, and "second-base" type activities. The scenes with sexual activity are animated, and some of them involve situations in which characters don't know what happened  (however, not through physical force, but with the characters' superpower: time-stop). 

All characters are well above the age of consent and all sexual situations are consensual. Appropriate triggers and warnings are provided.
